skills.name: Draconic Vortex
skills.description: [SP: 6][CD: 15] Leaps towards the target to unleash a spinning slash, dealing 600% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies in a large AOE and immobilizing them for 4.5s. During the period, the enemies also bleed, taking 240 DMG every 0.5s.

skills.name: Blood Thirsty
skills.description: Every hit against a bleeding enemy heals the character for 40 HP.
